participant_1.background:
I like long walks on the beach.
I love rock climbing.
I drive a honda civic.
My favorite movie is django unchained.

participant_2.background:
I am a cyclist.
My father used to be a cop.
I work at a restaurant as waiter.
My favorite food is pizza.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go cycling! I've been riding bikes since I was a kid, and I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face.
That sounds really fun! I've never been much of a cyclist, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a great way to get exercise and explore your surroundings.
I think I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to go rock climbing! It's a really challenging and exciting sport, and it's a great way to get in shape.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to try rock climbing, but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely try it! It's a lot of fun, and it's a great way to meet new people.
I think I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What do you do for work?
I work as a waiter at a restaurant. I love it because I get to meet new people and I get to be creative with my food.
That sounds like a fun job! I've always wanted to be a waiter, but I'm not sure if I'm good enough with people.
It's not that hard! You just have to be friendly and helpful.
I think I could do that!
I'm sure you could! What's your favorite food?
My favorite food is pizza! I love how it's so easy to customize and there are so many different toppings to choose from.
That's my favorite food too! I love pizza so much that I could eat it every day.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too!
